module.name: Filestore
module.changelog: *15.0.9* Packaging of ver 15.0.9 *15.0.8* Packaging of ver 15.0.8 *15.0.7* Packaging of ver 15.0.7 *15.0.6* FREEI-4949 *15.0.5* FREEPBX-23808 *15.0.4* bump *15.0.3.32* Packaging of ver 15.0.3.32 *15.0.3.31* FREEPBX-23559 removing white spaces at ends for input fields *15.0.3.30* FREEPBX-23252 *15.0.3.29* Bugfix/FREEPBX-23252 restore does not display ftp backups created with a subdirectory *15.0.3.28* FREEPBX-23323 S3 Region Updates *15.0.3.27* feat(filestore): Add support for default credential provider chain on S3. *15.0.3.26* FREEPBX-22083 add ability to set custom endpoint *15.0.3.25* FREEPBX-22759 Removed 'The given id seems invalid' exception because this exception is not required *15.0.3.24* FREEI-3770 Added condition to throw error if invalid Id is given and removed base64 encoding on filestore id while returning filestore id *15.0.3.23* FREEPBX-22683 Add the functionality to implement the ssl flag in filestore ftp *15.0.3.22* FREEI-3538 Removed id field type from gql api *15.0.3.21* FREEI-3538 Changed id field type from STRING to ID in gql api *15.0.3.20* FREEI-3560 changed FTP default port from 22 to 21 while creating FTP instance from GQL API *15.0.3.19* FREEI-3442 afteappending x FTP_ to id was update the id field toFTP_ *15.0.3.18* Fixes location combined key format *15.0.3.17* FREEI-3434 GQL api's for update and delete ftp instance along with unit tests *15.0.3.16* Modified fetchAllFilestores gql to return combined key of filestore type and id *15.0.3.15* FREEI-3392 Created GQL API to fetchAllFilestores and Unit tests *15.0.3.14* FREEI-3296 GQL API lo list filestore location with unit test *15.0.3.13* *15.0.3.12* FREEI-2062 Restore to 15 from a 13/14 backup not restoring POMPS backup settings *15.0.3.11* Packaging of ver 15.0.3.11 *15.0.3.10* Packaging of ver 15.0.3.10 *15.0.3.9* Fixing FREEI-1715 Adding FTP timeout default value *15.0.3.8* FREEPBX-21378 Backups failing due to timeout *15.0.3.7* FREEI-996 Local backup not saved if the backup path is mentioned with quotes. *15.0.3.6* FREEPBX-20737 SSH backup failed after FreePBX 14 -> 15 upgrade *15.0.3.5* FREEI-833 File Store: help text for Local Directory items could be better *15.0.3.4* Bugfix/FREEPBX-20571 getting listcontents method is not implemented *15.0.3.3* Related to FREEPBX-20414: removed $jobid from runRestore() *15.0.3.2* FREEPBX-20065 Backup to Email Fails Due To Alleged File Size Excess *15.0.3.1* Fixing FREEPBX-20011 Editing a Filestore -Email entry is creating the duplicate entry *15.0.2.4* FREEPBX-19655 Fix S3 naming conventions *15.0.2.3* Dont remove old filestores when upgrading *15.0.2.2* Fix ability to add S3 *15.0.2.1* FREEPBX-18248 *15.0.2* Update functionality *15.0.1.10* fixing legacy restore *15.0.1.9* FREEPBX-18729 Fix S3 action and general consistency *15.0.1.8* FREEPBX-18248 Fix delete parameter in edit forms *15.0.1.7* Fixing FREEPBX-18651 *15.0.1.6* FREEPBX-18652 Fix logic on region to match the actual setting *15.0.1.5* FREEPBX-18249 Fix s3 grid delete link *15.0.1.4* Formatting *15.0.1.3* FREEPBX-18244 Add the SFTP library back. *15.0.1.2* FREEPBX-18224 Fix local add button *15.0.1* Stable Release *15.0.1alpha1* Initial release
